taskbody.context: Dialed Number Identification Service (DNIS) is a service that help the users to know which trunk number is dialed by the customers. DNIS is useful in determining how to answer an inbound call.

step.cmd: Go to Settings PBX Trunks , choose the desired trunk, and edit it.
On the configuration page, click Advanced tab.
Enter the trunk DID number, and set the DNIS name.

taskbody.result:
As the configuration set above:
when a customer calls 5503301, the extension user who receives the call will see the caller ID shown as the figure below.
when a customer calls 5503305, the extension user who received\s the call will see the caller ID shown as the figure below.
